answers.answer: Hi!Normally yes, it would heal. However, if you have diabetes or a vascular disorder or a skin infection or wound infection, then it may not. Also, it depens on how much skin is lost. Sometimes the healing will involve a lot of scarring, and hence suturing the ends may be the only option.Since I cannot examine you and please consult your PCP for an assessment of the wound. Take care!

question: Will a cut to a finger heal if I cut 1/4 inch circular flap of skin nearly off the tip while cutting a tomato yesterday?
title: Cut finger
